sentences.en: A virtuous and industrious people may be cheaply governed.
sentences.cn: 善良和勤劳的人民也许易于管理.

sentences.en: Eliza sat cold, impassible, and assiduously industrious.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎冷冷地, 无动于衷地坐着, 勤奋地干着活儿.

sentences.en: He isn't particularly clever but industrious.
sentences.cn: 他并不特别聪明,但很勤奋.

sentences.en: He may not be so clever as Peter, but he is as industrious as can be.
sentences.cn: 他也许不如彼得聪明, 但却用功极了.

sentences.en: His experience was only the experience of the majority of that industrious night - school in the cabin.
sentences.cn: 他的经验教训,不过是舱内那批孜孜不倦的夜校学生中多数人的经验教训罢了.

sentences.en: His extortions from the industrious poor have been beyond computation.
sentences.cn: 他对劳苦人民的横征暴敛无法计算.

sentences.en: If the tiller is industrious, the farmland is productive.
Industrious with work , and a sense of team work.
sentences.cn: 良好的敬业精神和一定的团队协作能力.

sentences.en: It was a world of good little people, comfortable , industrious , credulous.
sentences.cn: 住在这里的是些善良的小人物, 舒适,勤恳, 自信.

sentences.en: She was an industrious and willing worker.
sentences.cn: 她是个勤劳肯干的员工。

sentences.en: She's coming across as a likable, hard working, and industrious player.
sentences.cn: 她的可爱, 努力, 勤勉给人留下很深刻的印象.

sentences.en: The ideals of the progressive Chinese are in keeping with the peaceful, industrious traditions of China.
sentences.cn: 中国进步人士的理想是与中国和平 、 勤劳的传统相适应的.

sentences.en: The three led a joyous and secluded life, contented , industrious, happy, asking nothing better.
sentences.cn: 三个人过着快快活活的隐居生活, 心里又满足又愉快, 工作勤劳, 与世无争.

sentences.en: We Chinese people are brave and industrious.
sentences.cn: 我们中国人是勇敢勤劳的.

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的

trans.tran_cn: 勤劳的，勤奋的，勤恳的，刻苦的，昧旦晨兴，手勤
trans.tran_en: someone who is industrious works hard
